The worst service in HITSTORY! Booked a flight from malaga to paris. Later on I tried to change it to another date. The change didnt go through and I had a confirmation for the 28th. On the night before our flight I wanted to check in.. Only to see that Vueling requested a charge from me of 229 euro. I was confused, but paid it anyway. Then I find out that it for the old change requested, this is after the flight have left Malaga and already landed in Paris. And by that payment they cancelled my flight on the 28th. So leaving me with NO FLIGHT at all - and when I call to ask them what is going on they say its my own fault, and I need to make a new booking!!!!! Hotel in paris and return flight is already paid for, so have no other choice than to book another one! Thanks for a super bad service, regards unsatified costumer
